thread.title: BRIEF-AGS Reports Q4 Loss Per Share of $0.37

title: BRIEF-AGS Reports Q4 Loss Per Share of $0.37
text: March 14, 2018 / 5:44 PM / Updated 31 minutes ago BRIEF-AGS Reports Q4 Loss Per Share of $0.37 Reuters Staff March 14 (Reuters) - Playags Inc: * AGS ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE $57.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $55.3 MILLION * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.37 * ‍EXPECT TO GENERATE TOTAL ADJUSTED EBITDA OF $124 MILLION - $130 MILLION IN 2018​ * ‍EXPECTS 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO BE IN RANGE OF $55 MILLION - $60 MILLION​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.47, REVENUE VIEW $55.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
